Package main.java.org.skloch.game

Class SoundManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.org.skloch.game.SoundManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    public class SoundManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    A class handling loading, playing and disposing of sounds.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean footstepBool  
      com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music menuMusic  
      com.badlogic.gdx.audio.Music overworldMusic  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SoundManager()
      A class to handle playing sounds in the game, handles loading and playing of music and sounds so a GameScreen can just call "play overworld music" without needing to know the track title.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void dispose()
      Disposes of all music and sound effects
      float getMusicVolume()  
      float getSfxVolume()  
      void pauseOverworldMusic()
      Pauses the overworld music, so it can be resumed from this point later
      void playButton()
      A sound for when a button is pressed
      void playDialogueOpen()
      A sound for when the dialogue box appears
      void playDialogueOption()
      A sound for when the arrow in the selectBox is moved
      void playFootstep()
      Plays an alternating footstep sound when the player is moving and the footstepTimer variable has hit zero.
      void playMenuMusic()
      Plays the music for the menu
      void playOverworldMusic()
      Plays the music for the overworld (main game)
      void playPauseSound()
      A sound for when the pause menu appears

      Updates the timers for sounds that repeat regularly, needs to be called every render cycle.

      Sets the volume of the music

    • Constructor Detail

      • SoundManager

        public SoundManager()
        A class to handle playing sounds in the game, handles loading and playing of music and sounds so a GameScreen can just call "play overworld music" without needing to know the track title. Also handles disposing sounds and music

      • processTimers

        public void processTimers​(float delta)
        Updates the timers for sounds that repeat regularly, needs to be called every render cycle. Specifically handles triggering footsteps when the player is moving
        Parameters:
        delta - Time passed since the last render

      • playFootstep

        public void playFootstep()
        Plays an alternating footstep sound when the player is moving and the footstepTimer variable has hit zero. Uses two different SFX to sound more realistic and to allow the timing to be configured

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes of all music and sound effects
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
